name: VR Car Crash Test 3D Simulator
description:
VR Car Crash Test 3D Simulator
VR Auto Crash Test Simulator 3D - is a unique game application, where you can visit the place mannequin crash test!
You think you're brave? You want to feel that something new?
Then our app for you!
Try not to close your eyes when the car is flying at full speed into the wall!
Your task is to cope with the management!
But not everything is so simple, you will interfere with various obstacles!
The more you break the car, the more points you get!
Accumulate points and unlock new cars!
For all fans of puzzle and destroy!
Unlock the entire vehicle fleet and become the replacement mannequin!
This is not the Challenge Manik - everything seriously!
Leave us your feedback and assessment, and we'll make our game even better! Thank you for choosing us!
